text:
Set in the 1990s, Captain Marvel follows Danvers, an Air Force officer, as she becomes one of the universe's most powerful heroes after earth gets involved in a galactic war between alien. Directed by Anna Boden and Ryan Fleck, the film is set to release on March 8, 2019.

The movie takes place in the 1990s, with Brie Larson playing Carol Danvers, aka Captain Marvel, an Air Force pilot who gains incredible powers after being exposed to alien DNA. Jude Law plays the Kree warrior Mar-Vell, Samuel L. Jackson returns as Nick Fury, and Ben Mendelsohn is Talos, the leader of the Skrulls.

Captain Marvel has been at the center of much speculation and anticipation since it was first announced in 2013. The film has had its share of controversies, including some fans objecting to Brie Larson's casting and the film's depiction of her character. Despite these criticisms, the trailer promises an exciting and action-packed adventure that will explore the origins of one of Marvel's most iconic superheroes.

Watch the new Captain Marvel trailer above!

Source: Entertainment Weekly

A New Trailer for Captain Marvel Has Been Released

Marvel Studios has unveiled a brand new trailer for the highly anticipated superhero film, Captain Marvel.
